```pddl
[
  (:action make
    ; Make a resource and update its state
    :parameters (?entity - object ?actor - person)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (not (completed ?entity)) (can_modify ?entity ?actor))
    :effect (and (completed ?entity) (modified_by ?entity ?actor))
  ),
  (:action add
    :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (has ?actor ?item) (at ?actor ?container) (is_empty ?container))
    :effect (and (not (is_empty ?container)) (contains ?container ?item))
  ),
  (:action heat
    ; Heat a resource using an available heating mechanism
    :parameters (?entity - object ?heat_source - object ?actor - person)
    :precondition (and (ingredients_added ?entity) (at ?actor ?heat_source) (connected ?entity ?heat_source))
    :effect (heating ?entity)
  ),
  (:action serve
    ; Serve an item and update its status
    :parameters (?server - person ?target - person ?item - item)
    :precondition (and (ready ?item) (inventory ?server ?item) (at ?server ?target))
    :effect (and (served ?item) (not (empty ?item)))
  ),
  (:action keep
    ; Maintain a state or assign a task to maintain state
    :parameters (?agent - person ?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (valid_state ?entity) (available ?agent) (not (maintained ?entity)))
    :effect (maintained ?entity)
  )
]
```
